title: iduvO vidhi appanE
sahitya:
iduvO vidhi appanE unnaDiyArkkum inda ulagil eppOdum paramporuLE


anupallavi

  podu nalamE purinda puNNiya shIlargaL pullarshei tunbattAl allarppaDuvadum


caraNam 1    nalam sheida kristuvum siluvaiyil marittadEn nalla nabhi nAyakam kalleri paTTadEn
pulavan shankaran viDam pughundu maDindadEn puNNiya mIrAvum kaN kasind-uDaindadEn
    caraNam 2    kaNNanait-tuyar sheyyak-kamsan muLaittadEn kAr mEgha rAmanaip-pOr mEgham vaLaittadEn
maNNulagirkku nalam paNNum payan iduvO mAdhava shIlargaL vEdanaip-paDuvadEn
